_header: As I went on Yule day in our procession
Subjects: carols, amorous; Christmastide; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: Joly Jankin — seven 3-line stanzas (aab) with kyrieleyson refrain and burden: ‘kyrie so kyrie / Iankyn syngyt merie / with aleyson’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
As I went on yol day in owre prosessyonKnew I joly jankyn be his
                    mery ton…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Benedicamus domino cryst fro schame me schyldeDeo gracias
                    therto alas I go with chyldeKyrieleyson
